entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Airdrie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:37 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Fog, 1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Calgary Int'l Airport 1:24 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Condition: Fog
Temperature: 1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 1.1°C
Wind: SE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of drizzle mixed with freezing drizzle. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle or freezing drizzle. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 6 this afternoon. Forecast issued 1:40 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of drizzle mixed with freezing drizzle. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle or freezing drizzle ending this evening then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 1:40 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 1:40 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
